name: VolumeAttachment
description: Attaches an Amazon EBS volume to a running instance and exposes it to the instance with the specified device name.

properties.name: Device
properties.description: How the device is exposed to the instance (e.g., /dev/sdh, or xvdh).

properties.name: InstanceId
properties.description: The ID of the instance to which the volume attaches. This value can be a reference to an AWS::EC2::Instance resource, or it can be the physical ID of an existing EC2 instance.

properties.name: VolumeId
properties.description: The ID of the Amazon EBS volume. The volume and instance must be within the same Availability Zone. This value can be a reference to an AWS::EC2::Volume resource, or it can be the volume ID of an existing Amazon EBS volume.
